identified-content.person: MAGNANO, ROBERT JOSEPH L DENNIS KOZLOWSKI

block.p: Kimberly Sue Kozlowski, the daughter of Darlene and Dennis Kozlowski of Columbus, Ohio, was married yesterday to Robert Joseph Magnano, a son of Sheila Magnano of Norwalk, Conn., and the late Joseph P. Magnano. The Rev. David Blanchfield performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at the Church of Our Lady of Victory in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Magnano, both 27, are studying for M.B.A. degrees at Columbia University and work for accounting firms in New York. She is a manager in the banking group of Ernst & Young. He is a business consultant in the consumer products group of Coopers & Lybrand.

Kimberly Sue Kozlowski, the daughter of Darlene and Dennis Kozlowski of Columbus, Ohio, was married yesterday to Robert Joseph Magnano, a son of Sheila Magnano of Norwalk, Conn., and the late Joseph P. Magnano. The Rev. David Blanchfield performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at the Church of Our Lady of Victory in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Magnano, both 27, are studying for M.B.A. degrees at Columbia University and work for accounting firms in New York. She is a manager in the banking group of Ernst & Young. He is a business consultant in the consumer products group of Coopers & Lybrand.
The bride is a graduate of the University of Notre Dame. Her father is a partner in and a director of the accounting firm of KPMG Peat Marwick, in Columbus.
The bridegroom graduated from New York University. His father retired as the engineering and operations manager of the Howe Furniture Company, an office-equipment manufacturer in Norwalk.
